title: We NEED To Be On A Break and The VIP List
description:
On the show this week, Lauren is exhausted and looking for a much-needed, decadent escape. She finds it in her guests, The VIP List: Meg and Audrey have no shame in their over-the-top TikTok restaurant review game, and it’s all delicious. Lauren also designates the "Chic of the Week" (the movie ‘Dune’) and "Shit of the Week" (where is our Fall-iday?!?). Plus, Adele -- please, just drop the album already. 
Follow the VIP List NYC on IG
Follow the VIP List NYC on TikTok

Watch the podcast on YouTube: https://bit.ly/ChicShitOnlyYT
Watch the podcast on IG: https://bit.ly/ChicShitOnlyIG
Don’t forget to subscribe to the podcast for free wherever you're listening or by using this link: https://bit.ly/ChicShitOnlyPodcast
